pullRequest.body:
Added a result on composition of lift of the localization map on Monoids. Modified some cases'.

```suggestion (k : Submonoid.LocalizationMap T Q) {A : Type*} [CommMonoid A]{l : M â†’* A} ```
This should be indented two spaces

nit:
```suggestion
  have hlS (y : S) : IsUnit (l â†‘y) := hl âŸ¨ _ , hST (SetLike.coe_mem y)âŸ©
  have hkS (y : S) : IsUnit (k.toMap â†‘y) := map_units k âŸ¨ _ , hST (SetLike.coe_mem y)âŸ©
```

```suggestion
  suffices aux1 : j.comp f.toMap = l by
    exact (lift_unique f hlS (fun x â†¦ congrFun (congrArg DFunLike.coe aux1) x)).symm
```

```suggestion
/-- Given Localization maps `f : M â†’* N` for a Submonoid `S âŠ† M` and
`k : M â†’* Q` for a Submonoid `T âŠ† M`, such that `S â‰¤ T`, and we have
`l : M â†’* A`, the composition of the induced map `f.lift` for `k` with
the induced map `k.lift` for `l` is equal to the  induced map `f.lift` for `l`. -/
@[to_additive
    "Given Localization maps `f : M â†’+ N` for a Submonoid `S âŠ† M` and
`k : M â†’+ Q` for a Submonoid `T âŠ† M`, such that `S â‰¤ T`, and we have
`l : M â†’+ A`, the composition of the induced map `f.lift` for `k` with
the induced map `k.lift` for `l` is equal to the  induced map `f.lift` for `l`"]
theorem lift_comp_lift {T : Submonoid M} (hST: S â‰¤ T) {Q : Type*} [CommMonoid Q]
    (k : LocalizationMap T Q) {A : Type*} [CommMonoid A] {l : M â†’* A}
    (hl : âˆ€ w : T, IsUnit (l w)) :
    (k.lift hl).comp (f.lift (map_units k âŸ¨_, hST Â·.2âŸ©)) =
    f.lift (hl âŸ¨_, hST Â·.2âŸ©) := .symm <|
  lift_unique _ _ fun x â†¦ by rw [â† MonoidHom.comp_apply, MonoidHom.comp_assoc, lift_comp, lift_comp]

@[to_additive]
theorem lift_comp_lift_eq {Q : Type*} [CommMonoid Q] (k : LocalizationMap S Q)
    {A : Type*} [CommMonoid A] {l : M â†’* A} (hl : âˆ€ w : S, IsUnit (l w)) :
    (k.lift hl).comp (f.lift k.map_units) = f.lift hl :=
  lift_comp_lift f le_rfl k hl
```

```
    k.lift f.map_units (f.lift k.map_units z) = z :=
  (DFunLike.congr_fun (lift_comp_lift_eq f k f.map_units) z).trans (lift_id f z)
```
Why remove these? I think they refer to `[IsScalarTower R M M]` in the statement.

```

    {A : Type*} [CommMonoid A] {l : M â†’* A} (hl : âˆ€ w : S, IsUnit (l w)) :
    (k.lift hl).comp (f.lift k.map_units) = f.lift hl :=
```
